title: SNOWPARK_CONTAINER_SERVICES_HISTORY View (ACCOUNT_USAGE): New Columns | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_05 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the SNOWPARK_CONTAINER_SERVICES_HISTORY view includes the following new columns that appear immediately after the compute_pool_name column.
TRUE, if the compute pool was created for an application.

The name of the application for which the compute pool was created. NULL if the compute pool was not created for an
application or if the application no longer exists.
The ID of the application for which the compute pool was created; otherwise NULL.
